page.title: 14 RECREATION
page.content:
4.Arniston Rangers Football Club
A stadium and football pitch at Newbyres Park is the venue for the team who are part of the junior amateur league. 5. The Brown Building A community education dept.run building.Named after the colour of the bricks,it stands beside the leisure centre.There are many activities catering especially for those not in full employment. Acivities:Brownies,Guides,Boys'Brigade ,Beavers,Pipe Band,Girl's Athletic Club,Youth Clubs,Horticultural Society,Community Develop. Assoc., Discos,Mother and Toddler Group and an Arts and Crafts Group. The rooms are available for hiring by many local groups and associations.
